Ketu.summary: This pratyadasha emphasizes spirituality, detachment, and inner reflection. Past karmas and healing may surface; focus on simplicity and letting go.

Venus.summary: Relationships, creativity, and comfort are highlighted. A time for love, art, and material ease when approached with balance.

Sun.summary: Leadership, confidence, and authority come to the fore. Career and respect from others may grow; balance ego with humility.

Moon.summary: Emotions, mother, and change of place or mood are in focus. Travel and creativity supported; emotional balance is key.

Mars.summary: Energy, courage, and initiative are strong. Property, technical work, or competition may feature; channel drive constructively.

Rahu.summary: Sudden changes, ambition, and material pursuits are highlighted. Gains mixed with restlessness; stay grounded and avoid shortcuts.

Jupiter.summary: Wisdom, growth, and good fortune are favored. Education, children, and dharma may flourish; a generally auspicious sub-period.

Saturn.summary: Discipline, delays, and long-term gains through patience. Service and structure bring rewards; health and elders may need attention.

Mercury.summary: Communication, business, and intellect are supported. Learning, writing, and trade may do well; balance restlessness with focus.
